name: Gemini CLI Delegation & Large Context Routing
summary: Intelligently delegate large-context tasks to Gemini CLI via MCP integration for document analysis, codebase review, and multi-file processing.
capabilities: Large file and codebase analysis delegation
Context window optimization (Claude ≤200k vs Gemini ≤1M tokens)
Sandbox code testing through Gemini MCP
Strategic task routing between Claude and Gemini
